amendment.description: Amendment lists state-by-state funding allocations under the 3rd round for the Neighborhood Stabilization Program which are subject to possible rescission.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 112-34 to list state-by-state funding allocations of Neighborhood Stabilization Programs Round Three potentially at risk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Ellison.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
